text: Harold & Kumar is an American series of stoner comedy movies. There are three movies in total. The movies star John Cho (Harold Lee), Kal Penn (Kumar Patel) and Neil Patrick Harris (himself). The first movie, Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle, was released on July 30, 2004. The second movie, Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay, was released on April 25, 2008. The third and final movie, A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas, was released on November 4, 2011. The reviews of each movie has been mixed, but they have all done well at the box office. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2000s comedy movies Category:2010s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Buddy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Alabama Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Series of movies
title: Harold & Kumar
